<small>Aramaic form: [[H8627]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּקַן‎</span>] **verb** ==become straight== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקֵּן‎</span> ***arrange, put right***; [[Eccl.47.9|Eccl 47:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תיקן‎</span> ***set in order***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***takânu***</u></abbr>, ***be well ordered***, especially Pi\`el as Late Hebrew; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be established, firm***, Pa\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּקֵּין‎</span> ***fix, arrange, prepare***, etc.; Palmyrene Pa\`el ***erect***); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִתְקֹן‎</span> [[Eccl.1.15|Eccl 1:15]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֻוָּת‎</span> ***bent***). **Pi\`el** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְתַקֵּן‎</span> [[Eccl.7.13|Eccl 7:13]] ***make straight*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוָּה‎</span>); ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקֵּן‎</span> [[Eccl.12.9|Eccl 12:9]] ***put straight, arrange in order*** (proverbs).
